Title: SPA Tools
Description: SPA Tools is an open-source set of tools which help creating some beautiful and responsive Single Page Applications.
HomeWiki:
SPA Tools

SPA Tools is an open-source set of tools which help creating some beautiful and responsive SPA.
This packages depends on several javascript libraries :
  • Knockout
  • Underscore
  • jQuery
  • Sammy

Data context

  • Javascript ORM
  • Mapped to OData Service
  • Relations (one2many, one2one, many2one)
  • Local Cache
  • Extensible

Knockout Extensions

  • Underscore integration
  • Moment integration
  • jQuery UI integration
  • Many binding handlers
  • Many extenders

SPA Bootstrapper

  • Wrappers
  • Navigation
  • LocalStorage
  • Messaging (inter View Model)
  • App Templates
